name: skip :ohno: (@skipcloud@inane.chat)
summary:
I haven't been on here as much as I would like recently, I've been opting to look at the bin fire that is #Twitter 

I think I need to follow more leftists here. For too many years I've had an algorithm show new people/content to me so actively seeking out a community takes work.

Cutting that algorithmic cord is harder than I thought it would be.
